CMP_1F7EDA.name: New Customers
CMP_1F7EDA.message:
Here's a welcome email to loyalty members to reinforce value and encourage re-engagement:

Subject: You're Now a Part of Our Community

Dear [Name],

A warm welcome to our loyalty program! As a valued member, you'll enjoy exclusive benefits, early access to new products, and personalized rewards. Explore our offers and start earning today. Thank you for joining us!

Best, [Brand Name]

metrics.explanation: Metrics updated using simulated engagement events.
